docs.snippet: Three left-leaning German parties would now win enough combined support to oust Chancellor Angela Merkel in September's election, according to an opinion poll by the INSA institute to be published in Bild newspaper on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Three left-leaning German parties would now win enough combined support to oust Chancellor Angela Merkel in September's election, according to an opinion poll by the INSA institute to be published in Bild newspaper on Tuesday.

headline.main: German Left-Of-Center Majority Edges Ahead as Merkel Prospects Dim: Poll
